#summary How to configure Pingdom Alerts
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

Follow this guide to setup [http://www.pingdom.com Pingdom] alerts.  You can use a free Pingdom account to keep tabs on one server.


= Setup =

Create a new server monitor and you'll be presented with a screen like follows:

http://itsallgood.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/pingdom1.png

Then click on the optional settings and configure it like the example below.  What your doing is telling Pingdom that if the server returns this string of text, we have a problem and should be notified.

http://itsallgood.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/pingdom2.png
